name: .GB3
summary: Learn about .GB3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a GB3 file in the paid version of Geekbench 3 Pro (cross-platform). (You cannot open a GB3 file in any other version of Geekbench Pro.) To do so, open the GUI version of Geekbench 3 Pro and select File â†’ Open.... Then, navigate to and select your GB3 file. The results your GB3 file contains will appear in Geekbench 3 Pro.

If you do not have access to Geekbench 3 Pro, you can also open your GB3 file in any text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows) or Apple TextEdit (Mac). This will allow you to view the plain text used to show your test results in Geekbench 3 Pro.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .gb3 file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: GB3 file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
